select
from JD_COMMODITY where COMNAME like '%${COMNAME}%'
mapper.insert: insert into JD_COMMODITY (COMID, COMNAME, COMNNAME, KINDSID, PRICE, AMOUNT, DESCRIBE, SALEMSG, SALEAMOUNT, IMG) values (#{COMID,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{COMNAME,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{COMNNAME,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{KINDSID,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{PRICE,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{AMOUNT,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{DESCRIBE,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{SALEMSG,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{SALEAMOUNT,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{IMG,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update JD_COMMODITY
COMNAME = #{COMNAME,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMNNAME = #{COMNNAME,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
KINDSID = #{KINDSID,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PRICE = #{PRICE,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
AMOUNT = #{AMOUNT,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DESCRIBE = #{DESCRIBE,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SALEMSG = #{SALEMSG,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SALEAMOUNT = #{SALEAMOUNT,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
IMG = #{IMG,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where COMID = #{COMID,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update JD_COMMODITY set COMNAME = #{COMNAME,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMNNAME = #{COMNNAME,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, KINDSID = #{KINDSID,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PRICE = #{PRICE,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, AMOUNT = #{AMOUNT,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DESCRIBE = #{DESCRIBE,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SALEMSG = #{SALEMSG,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SALEAMOUNT = #{SALEAMOUNT,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, IMG = #{IMG,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where COMID = #{COMID,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
